title: I want a Winter Wonder Orianna for christmas.
body: Riot please make a snow globe winter wonder Orianna for the new merch store. I think It would be an amazing addition to the store and gives me another addition towards my xmas decorations. ty.

replies.body: You should make a snowglobe orianna sort of theme, I would totally dig it!

Oh why oh why....

Why is there a **dead** poro in the bottom left corner. The poro was SKINNED, and turned into a RUG. </3
Actually I was suggesting it for the new merch store they are working on, but I am happy for it too ;)

Why does the login have to be Orianna, of all the WW skin champions?

...Wait a minute, this isn't related to Lee Sin, why do I care?
